content: i grew up carrying my own grocery bags but for some reason it never clicked that i could replace those flimsy plastic bags from the produce section well it finally did and i ve been making these little things for a while now they work up in no time depending on the size they weigh between 5 and 19 grams and i always have 3 or 4 of them balled up in my grocery bag machine washable daaahling it s a new feature no more plastic bags please copy and pass this pattern around freely spread the word make them for your non-crocheting friends whaaat and let s get rid of as many plastic bags as we can
